blogPost.excerpt: Stike allows you to use your Debit Card, Credit Card or Bank account to instantly send and receive funds with 0 fees using the Bitcoin Lightning network to transmit payments. Users can also send to regular Bitcoin addresses as well.
blogPost.body: Stike allows you to use your Debit Card, Credit Card or Bank account to instantly send and receive funds with 0 fees using the Bitcoin Lightning network to transmit payments. Users can also send to regular Bitcoin addresses as well.
blogPost.title: Strike - Send money instantly, with no fees, anywhere in the world
blogPost.author: Henk Holveck

localize.description: Stike允许您使用您的借记卡、信用卡或银行账户以0费用使用比特币闪电网络即时发送和接收资金，传输支付。用户也可以向普通的比特币地址发送。
localize.tagline: 在世界任何地方即时汇款，不收取任何费用。

localize.description: Stike允許您使用您的借記卡、信用卡或銀行賬戶以0費用使用比特幣閃電網絡即時發送和接收資金，傳輸支付。用戶也可以向普通的比特幣地址發送。
localize.tagline: 在世界任何地方即時匯款，不收取任何費用。

previous.excerpt: GPU.LAND offers GPU instances for Deep Learning — at dirt-cheap prices. How cheap? Up to 80% cheaper vs major cloud providers. We believe everyone, and not just "Big Tech", should be able to train AI models. So we built the cheapest place on the web to do it.
previous.title: GPU.LAND - Affordable cloud GPUs for deep learning

localize.description: GPU.LAND为深度学习提供GPU实例--价格很便宜。有多便宜？与主要的云供应商相比，便宜了80%。我们相信每个人，而不仅仅是 "大科技"，都应该能够训练AI模型。因此，我们建立了网络上最便宜的地方来做这件事。
localize.tagline: 用于深度学习的平价云GPU

localize.description: GPU.LAND爲深度學習提供GPU實例--價格很便宜。有多便宜？與主要的雲供應商相比，便宜了80%。我們相信每個人，而不僅僅是 "大科技"，都應該能夠訓練AI模型。因此，我們建立了網絡上最便宜的地方來做這件事。
localize.tagline: 用於深度學習的平價雲GPU

next.excerpt: Paid Rooms lets you host paywalled private clubhouse rooms. Set one up in less than 30 seconds, simply: 1) Sign up with your phone number 2) Enter your room details 3) Share it an get paid 💰
next.title: Paid Clubhouse Rooms - Charge $$$ for Clubhouse rooms

localize.description: 付费房可以让您托管付费墙式私人会所房间。在不到30秒的时间里就可以设置一个，简单地说：1）用你的电话号码注册 2）输入你的房间细节 3）分享它并获得报酬 💰
付費房可以讓您託管付費牆式私人會所房間。在不到30秒的時間裏就可以設置一個，簡單地說：1）用你的電話號碼註冊 2）輸入你的房間細節 3）分享它並獲得報酬 💰
